entities.name: dumbledore's army
entities.description: Dumbledore's Army is mentioned as a group of students who are discussing their problems with boils.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the twins and is complaining about his boils.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is staring at the twins and cannot see any boils.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the twins and is making a dark comment about his boils.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is emerging from the Captain's office and is trying to get everyone's attention.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being asked by Angelina about his solution for foggy glasses.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who helped Harry with his glasses.

relationships.description: Harry mentions that Hermione was the one who helped him with his glasses.
Angelina is emerging from the Captain's office and is trying to get everyone's attention, implying she is in charge of Dumbledore's Army.
